title: REPLACE_ALL
description: Returns a new string in which all occurrences matching the provided regular expression (regex) within the original string are replaced by the specified replacement substring.

parameters.name: regex
parameters.description: The regular expression defining patterns to replace.

parameters.name: replacement
parameters.description: The substring used to replace matched patterns.

examples:
REPLACE_ALL("Acme inc; Beta INC; Gamma Inc.", "(?i) inc ", "Inc")
-- Returns "Acme Inc; Beta Inc; Gamma Inc.".
